title.rendered: Join Sisters of Rock and Root

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”116deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#282723 0%|rgba(0,0,0,0) 74%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#282723″ background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end_position=”74%” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/treeroots-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”10%||10%||false|false” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ admin_label=”Hero Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”46px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_font_size=”79px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#6b0906″ header_2_font_size=”74px” background_layout=”dark” animation_style=”fade” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Sisters of rock & Root

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”33px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_font_size_tablet=”29px” header_2_font_size_phone=”24px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Myth and Medicine

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”25px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/crone.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding_tablet=”||4%||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”26px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”||||||||” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_font_size_tablet=”22px” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” z_index_tablet=”500″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Sisters of Rock and Root is a unique year-long self-study online course: an experience for women who want to delve deeply into wild myth and archetypes. You’ll work with story to connect with the cycles and seasons of the year, and the themes associated with them as they arise in your own life.

In this course, myth is matched with medicine. Herbal recipes and land-based meditations for each season will encourage you to connect with the medicine of the land, and especially of herbs and plants, in a grounded, rooted way.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”100px||” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Rooting yourself in the cycles of the living land

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘Sisters of Rock and Root’ is organised around the eight seasonal festivals which many of us in Britain, Ireland, and other Celtic countries still acknowledge. The Winter and Summer Solstices, and the Spring and Autumn Equinoxes, are focused on astronomical events and so are relevant to anyone, no matter where you live. The other four, which are sometimes called ‘cross-quarter festivals’ (Imbolc, Bealtaine, Lughnasa and Samhain), have specific connotations in this part of the world, but the themes which we will work with during these times are sufficiently universal and archetypal that they will resonate with anyone interested in grounding themselves in the cycles and seasons of the year.

‘Sisters of Rock and Root’ is not about practicing any particular brand of spirituality; it is about deepening your relationship with the land you occupy, using the eight festivals as anchor points. From this grounding, ‘Sisters of Rock and Root’ offers you ways of carrying forward the lessons that you’ll learn here into your own unique journey through life.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||-2px|||” custom_padding=”33px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

WHAT YOu WILL receive

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.0″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”20px||” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to this year-long course, and at each of the eight seasonal festivals, you will be able to download:

– An illustrated telling of a Celtic/ European myth or fairy tale which has relevance to the issues and themes that we are reflecting on during the season in question, and a discussion of the psychological and ecopsychological issues that arise from that story. We’ll explore the key themes and images in each story, and the ways in which it connects us back to the land and its seasons and natural cycles, and its nonhuman inhabitants.

– An illustrated introduction to each of the eight seasonal festivals and the themes and ideas that each season offers us.

– A narrative guide for you to follow: one which you will slowly piece together over the eight instalments of the course, and which will allow you to experience the transformative power of myth and story in your own life. This material focuses on building our relationship with place, and on building a sense of belonging to the world.

– A seasonal ‘medicine’ booklet from Ruthie Hayes of Mother Hylde’s Herbal in Pennsylvania, USA. These booklets lead you to explore the medicine of the land, and especially of plants and herbs, and offer you herbal recipes and seasonal land-based meditations to help you ground yourself in the season. (Please note that the herbal medicine guides will be suitable for North America and Europe. With apologies, we’re unable to guarantee covering other parts of the world.)

When you join ‘Sisters of Rock & Root’, you’ll have access to the material online for the lifetime of this website. You are welcome to go around the annual wheel as often as you like; new and additional seasonal material will be added each year.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/CS10.jpg” disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”Own CS10″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/fullsizeoutput_dc.jpeg” disabled_on=”on|on|off” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/imbolc8-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#847873″ custom_padding=”||80px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ min_height=”401px” custom_padding=”4px|||||” custom_padding_tablet=”30px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”10px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fed593″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”22px||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

How TO JOIN

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_3_font_size=”28px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” z_index_tablet=”500″ text_text_align=”left” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You can join at any time during the year and the course will be available to you through a full calendar year, so that you can cover all eight instalments in order. Subscribers in both the northern and the southern hemispheres will be able to work with the materials that are relevant to their own seasons and calendars.

When you sign up to Sisters of Rock and Root, you’ll be prompted to create a login which will allow you access to the ‘Membership’ section of my website. IF YOU ALREADY HAVE AN ACCOUNT ON THIS SITE, YOU MUST USE THE SAME EMAIL ADDRESS AND USERNAME THAT YOU’RE ALREADY REGISTERED WITH, IN ORDER TO SEE ALL YOUR COURSES UNDER THE SAME MENU.

A few days before each seasonal festival, you will receive an email reminding you to log in and view the relevant course material, which you can download and work through in your own time, as your schedule permits.

The course fee is £80. Please follow the link below to make your payment using any credit or debit card. (For those of you in other countries: currency exchange rates change by the hour, and so we’re not able to tell you what the cost of this course is in your currency. This currency converter offers you live rates, though they may or may not reflect the rates actually given to you by your bank or credit card provider. It will, however, give you an indication.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

If you have a discount code, you must enter it by clicking on the ‘Have a coupon’ link above the ‘Select payment method’ section below, before completing your payment.  We cannot apply discount codes after the event, or create partial refunds in the case of errors.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ custom_padding=”25px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

*  Please agree to the course Terms & Conditions to continue

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Please note in particular, before purchasing, that no refunds can be given for this course.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Workshops and Events Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wolves-left-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”33%||33%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter, ‘The Art of Enchantment’, on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

If you’d like to become a paid subscriber, you’ll have access to exclusive articles, podcasts, chat and much more.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.substack.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”JOIN MY LIST” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: A unique year-long online course for women who want to delve deeply into wild stories, myths and archetypes, and so to connect in a grounded, rooted way with the cycles and seasons of the year.
